summary: A Restoration gem integrated into the game just like the Life gems you find in dark souls 2.
descriptionHtml:
A Restoration Gem integrated into the game just like the Life Gems you find in dark souls 2.

The gem is basically a scroll but made to look like a Gem and the lore idea is that its a healing item that the Draugrs can use but its mostly a dark souls 2 reference.

Also its a role playing item giving you another option to healing if you hate magic or potions so its basically restoration magic infused into a Gem so its a one time use just like the soul Gems.

The item has been added to the loot list for Draugrs mostly and manually added it to bleak falls barrows in a way it would naturally be placed and its a starting item.

Three versions of the Gems common, Greater, Grand
author: Odvic
